Nightlight:

Inside the base, Nightlight looked worried at Zeni and asked 
worried "Are you ok? are you wounded?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Zeni: No, I can still fight.
> 
> Arrow: You ignoramus! What about your frigging wounded soldier!? I 
hate you stupid Chivtrons, you let your own kind die!!!
> 
> Arrow starts crying.
> 
> Arrow thinking: I'm going to take my kid, and I'm going to leave 
this hellhole and find someplace else to be. We'll be just fine...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000@y... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 2:27 AM
>   Subject: RE: Chivtrons Shall Prevail
> 
> 
>   Nightlight:
> 
>   Nightlight fel one of the 10 shots she turned her body to see who 
was shotting her, "ZENIII!!" she ran towards the shields and she 
turned off and took Zeni and came back the base. After she came in 
she turn on the shields
>     ----- Original Message ----- 
>     From: Soulstice Omega 
>     To: nbwrpg@y... 
>     Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 1:06 AM
>     Subject: Re: Chivtrons Shall Prevail
> 
> 
>     Zeni runs right into the shields as they come up and gets the 
shock of his
>     life. He leans up against the wall right before the exit and 
wonders what
>     was wrong with him battling? Arrow had shown him. Arrow feels 
something is
>     wrong.
> 
>     Arrow: What the hell was that? And is anyone going to...never 
mind, I'll do
>     it, open the frigging shields!
> 
>     Airbomber dodges the shots and fires back at Nightlight 10 
times.
> 
>     Arrow: If you don't open the shields I'll blow your head off.
> 
>     Arrow was speaking to Nightlight...
> 
>     ----- Original Message -----
>     From: <airly2000@y...>
>     To: <nbwrpg@y...>
>     Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 1:25 AM
>     Subject: Re: Chivtrons Shall Prevail
> 
> 
>     > Nighlight:
>     >
>     > Nighlight opened and closed the shields letting at Linzyx and 
her
>     > left the ship and left  Zeni Inside the base.
>     >
>     > The shield was up again and  Nightlight shot against 
airbomber 25
>     > energy balls
>     >
>     > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
>     > > ::Grounded/Axis and Co./Lynxiz::
>     > > Grounded's memory's continued to flood back to him.  The 
other

>     > > mechanical one, in a final fight over organic life and it's 
future

battle
>     > they
>     > > raged against each other.  With a qucik snap of his wrist 
the
>     > organic
>     > > bot lashed his special energon whips across his arch-
enemy's face,
>     > > blinding him instantly. He remembers how the bot crazed, 
firing al
>     > over

>     > protector of
>     > > organic life.  The shot had put his spark into stasis lock. 
What
>     > had
>     > > happened to his foe, his evil half, he did not know. Until 
not long

if you
>     > need

He fired

continued to

impact at
